body_html: I'm going to close, since I don't think this is feasible in TensorFlow in a performant manner. Everything down to cuDNN assumes rectangular tensors, and uses this assumption to arrange for high arithmetic intensity. Fancy approaches which do manual tiling of irregularly sizes images are possible, but those would be a layer on top of tensorflow (or possibly something in tf.contrib).

body: I'm going to close, since I don't think this is feasible in TensorFlow in a performant manner.  Everything down to cuDNN assumes rectangular tensors, and uses this assumption to arrange for high arithmetic intensity.  Fancy approaches which do manual tiling of irregularly sizes images are possible, but those would be a layer on top of tensorflow (or possibly something in `tf.contrib`).
